attributes.action: Apply a 2% tax on all assets worth more than £10 million
attributes.additional_details: This tax would impact only 0.04% of the population but is estimated to raise £22 to £24 billion annually. The government needs this essential funding, which would help reduce inequality in the country and prevent a recession.
attributes.background: Implement a 2% levy on individuals who own assets worth more than £10 million.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Introduce a 2% wealth tax on assets over £10 million & tax reform 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721409
